subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: The first day of the rest of Michael Phelps’s life as a sports icon was a trip. It was not unlike a transatlantic flight: tiring, thrilling and a little turbulent.
snippet: The first day of the rest of Michael Phelps’s life as a sports icon was a trip. It was not unlike a transatlantic flight: tiring, thrilling and a little turbulent.
